page.title: 10WEST DEANERY LIVESTOCK FARM
page.content: Mr.Forster and his wife have 70 acres of good quality land around the farmhouse.15_20 acres are used for {barley}for winter feed.The rest is {grass}for hay and grazing.70 acres of reclaimed colliery land near Auckland Park and Shildon Bank are rented from the County Council.This is poorer quality{grazing}land .There is a{hay barn}and a storage shed.25 cattle are wintered in a modern{cattle {shed. There are 125-150 cattle and about 300 sheep.Animals are bought at {Darlington Livestock Mart}nearly every week.There are mainly{Hereford Cross {cattle}and{Suffolk Cross sheep.}The animals are fattened and then killed at a local{abattoir.}The meat is sold under contract to a local{supermarket.
